Images:

'background.png' :: http://opengameart.org/content/cartoony-cloud-images
all birds in 'birds/' directory from bevouliin (http://bevouliin.com), found on http://opengameart.org
preloader.gif from phaser-official (yeoman) github project
Chicken body/meat :: http://opengameart.org/content/shadowless-lpc-food

Audio:

Bite sound :: https://www.freesound.org/people/ggctuk/sounds/80551/
The Plucked Bird :: http://opengameart.org/content/the-plucked-bird-nes-version
acheivement :: https://www.freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270331/

Font:

Slap And Crumbly :: http://www.dafont.com/slap-and-crumbly.font#null
